_sText:
LORE
Do you think you know the story? Do you think you know everything? You think everything is just solved right?
I'm going to tell you a story... a story where all hope is gone, a story that takes place in a joyless world, in a world full of nothing but disaster, pain and chaos... I'm going to tell you a story, a story without a happy ending.


COMING SOON
The CSGO version is coming soon to the Steam Workshop and Theaters.

Maybe the 3rd one will be more balanced... ;)
